overview: Trump Card is an expose of the socialism, corruption and gangsterization that now define the Democratic Party. Whether it is the creeping socialism of Joe Biden or the overt socialism of Bernie Sanders, the film reveals what is unique about modern socialism, who is behind it, why itâ€™s evil, and how we can work together with President Trump to stop it.
tagline: Beating socialism, corruption and the deep state.
title: Trump Card
